item.description:
With the warm weather and our lack of central, it's time to turn our Meetups some place cooler for the summer.

We're crossing our fingers for good weather for our outdoor Meetup.

Join us on Salem Common with all of your outdoor games. We'll be bringing croquet, badminton, and bocce ball. Hopefully we'll have some volunteers with horseshoes, croquet, etc. Also, feel free to bring blankets and chairs and something to drink.
item.how_to_find_us: We're generally found near the Washington Arch by the intersection of Washington Sq. and Winter Street. We'll be setting up games.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Outdoor Games on the Common
